description:
Haul loads or ascend ropes without expending unnecessary energy. This lightweight progress capture pulley is exceptionally efficient (92%), thanks to its aluminum sheave with internal ball bearings.

  • Cam has a self-cleaning slot for grip on dirty or icy ropes
  • Cam can be locked in the open position for use as a regular pulley
  • Aluminum ball-bearings are highly efficient (92%)
  • Handles ropes with a diameter of 7–11mm
name: Edelrid Spoc Progress Capture Pulley
